Items.Name: Welcome Mat
Items.Description: A rubber mat with the words welcome to Zork written on it

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field next to a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the North side of a white house. There is no door here, all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the South side of a white house. There is no door here, all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the East, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you to the West and South.
